website_summaries.verdict: Classic game that's always fun to play and includes score pad, dice, and shaker cup.
pros: Almost unlimited number of people can play at the same time
Game ships with all of the gear you need to play
Easy to understand for young kids, yet also has a bit of strategy to it to keep adults entertained
Can be completed within a short amount of time
cons: Hard plastic shaker cup shipped in game is extremely loud

customer_reviews.title: You don't get the game pictured!! RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the photos...I ordered the game with the black and red dice, but received the basic game with no bells and whistles (white dice)...and paid $6-$7 dollars more than I needed to! This was false advertising! Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: 《DBLG》

customer_reviews.title: Not the black dice as shown! NOT Yahtzee Classic!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically was looking for the black dice which is what is shown in this ad. I had just used the black dice in a cruise ship I was on and really liked the shape of them. I received the ordinary white dice with it so I was disappointed to say the least! Should NOT show this photo... misleading!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Till

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. I play it with my children, who are 7 and 4. The 4 year old still needs a little bit of help, but he loves it. His favorite part is rolling the dice, of course. I played this game as a child and it's a great flashback to my childhood, and a wonderful memory of playing it with my dad, and also with my children.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: If you buy this Yahtzee game as pictured, you will receive a DIFFERENT VERSION OF YAHTZEE. !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The game I received was NOT AS PICTURED, THE DICE WERE WHITE, THERE WAS NO RED DRAWER AS PICTURED. THIS IS A RIP OFF Buyers Beware. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bowsman

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come as the black dice but that doesn’t matter to me. Still a great game. Only weird part was that there was two completely straight edge dice and three with rounded edges. Otherwise it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not the item pictured
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom because she wanted the black dice ... instead she got a standard yahtzee kit. Very disappointing. She kept it but was sad it wasn't what she was hoping for... Please update picture to reflect actual product that will ship.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: I've enjoyed playing this game since i was little
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed playing this game since i was little. I was a little disappointed because they used to come with books for the score cards and apparently don't now. it certainly doesn't take away from the game though. (i know some come with an electronic timer, but this one has the hourglass timer)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: I hate the new hockey puck type cup they have now
customer_reviews.text: Playing Yahtzee brings back memories of being a little girl. I used to play all the time with my grandparents. While the game is still the same, I hate the new hockey puck type cup they have now. My kids have dice flying all over the place with that thing. It was an easy fix, we just got a cup out and used it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love yahtzee.  Nice quality die.
customer_reviews.text: Yup - it's yahtzee. Works great. Is as advertised. Just wish they still sold them with the felt unit to catch the rolled die.
customer_reviews.author: Suki O

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Great price. I don’t love the rounded edges on the dice but that’s an opinion thing. Not a reflection of the product.
customer_reviews.author: ominalouise

customer_reviews.title: Not the item pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the Yahtzee classic that is pictured. I specifically ordered this because it was the Yahtzee classic with the black dice and just got regular Yahtzee with the white, curved corner dice.
customer_reviews.author: shannonkeil

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: I am utterly disappointed in this order. They show different color Yahtzee just to get people to order theirs. But, what you get is a generic, plain copy.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the cup!
customer_reviews.text: Yahtzee is a classic...how can you go wrong? That small thing is not the same as the cup. Everyone commented that they missed the cup.
customer_reviews.author: troublemaker

customer_reviews.title: You can fold several scoring sheets small enough to fit into the case under the dice to make an easy, small item to pack
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I was hoping for. You can fold several scoring sheets small enough to fit into the case under the dice to make an easy, small item to pack. The case is plastic, but seems sturdy enough to last. Yes, it does make a rather loud rattle, but can be buffered with your hands. Just took it on one trip, and plan to pack it for my next.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Yahtzee
customer_reviews.text: It's Yahtzee enough said. Great game . Had to make it part of our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Princess at Plymouth
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the box that shakes the dice in it because it is too loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted.. Thanks for the high level of professionalism...
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get exactly what you order.
customer_reviews.text: You don’t get a game that looks like this. They sent the same old same old game. It was disappointing because my sister wanted this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Rossi

customer_reviews.title: a true classic
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun. I had played once as a kid and liked it ok. We have started as a family to play often and it's even more fun. Stayed up till 2 am on Christmas Eve playing! Great family time!
customer_reviews.author: dogsRtheBEST

customer_reviews.title: great game, got it for the daughter
customer_reviews.text: great game, got it for the daughter, if it doesn't have a touch screen, she doesn't know it exists. it reminded me of when we were kids, she loved it. Hands on is so much better than touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: David Willey

customer_reviews.title: Playing Zahtzee never gets old
customer_reviews.text: This game grows with you. It's fun for kids as well as adults. It has been around for a long time and can be considered a "classic." It doesn't need need an introduction really. I recommend it to any family who doesn't own it. I gave this one as a present and received a big "thank you."
customer_reviews.author: Linda Chapell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game, reasonable price, fun for the whole family, delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: WI-Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Around for ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a grandchild over the age of 7 who doesn't like this game. And I have 14 grandchildren. My own kids loved it 35 years ago and we played it often.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: YAHTZEE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I played this while we were away and quickly got addicted. I had to come home and order it. We played it almost every day for two weeks. It's a blast on a day when we're just chillin' and wanting to have a game day.
customer_reviews.author: Cfeld1123

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Yahtzee's always fun. This set did the job: dice, cup and plenty of pads.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne

customer_reviews.title: Great game and everyone should have it at home
customer_reviews.text: Great game and everyone should have it at home. Get everyone out of their devices and into a game with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT GET WHAT YOU WANT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very, VERY disappointed in what I received. The picture clearly shows black and red dice. That is the ONLY reason I purchased this particular set and the one sent to me is regular white dice. I'm very upset and disappointed. I wish I could give ZERO stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I stink at this game but it's a fun game for the boys and I.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J.

customer_reviews.title: Best family game
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific game for the family. We don't use the yellow chips, I still haven't read what those are for, but hey we didn't need them when we were young. This is such a great game for anyone who truly wants to spend quality time with their family.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: A big fan of Yahtzee and now it's my younger ...
customer_reviews.text: A big fan of Yahtzee and now it's my younger kids who are learning. The only reason I give it 4 rather than five is that I miss the felt lined cups they used to have.
customer_reviews.author: zev

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't got into it yet. But the dice container is different
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Memories
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remembered- comes with lots of score pads. We enjoyed playing over the holidays. A little like poker with dice without the betting.
customer_reviews.author: therapis01

customer_reviews.title: Good for all ages
customer_reviews.text: The classic game. Good for all ages. Only change from original is a smaller cup for rolling dice.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for 2 or more.
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play as a couple, friends or even as a group.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: No more red cup!
customer_reviews.text: Half the reason I bought this was for the classic little red cup. This one has this black cup-like thing that is absolutely no fun to roll dice with.
customer_reviews.author: P. roddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for everyone. Packaged & parts just as described. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: We have so much fun.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter makes up rules as she is only 5. We have so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Instructions to play were easy to follow and everything came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lenox James

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ole favorite to play with family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gotcha15

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be the black dice set and I received the white
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: When you are too drunk to play anything else at camp, this is your classic solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived on time and in great shape. The kids enjoy playing the game. The box is rather big, though, for the game pieces and could be reduced to help save the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Daisies

customer_reviews.title: Classic game!
customer_reviews.text: I use to play this game when I was a child, and now am playing it with my 8 year old. Classic game, classic fun!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Von Bargen

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good family game. Ennoyed it with my grandchildren age 8 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a game I can actually get my son to play with me. Hours of fun
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Pocket fun for my family as we travel abroad.
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Yahtzee. Five dice, and a couple sheets of paper packs in your pocket making the perfect travel companion.
customer_reviews.author: Fife

customer_reviews.title: Very nice game!
customer_reviews.text: The dice are just the right size for us and the score pad makes it very easy to keep the score. Easy to use and fun! Another thing I like is that once you have used all the score pads that come with the original box you can buy additional ones.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Like new? I just received this. The box is ripped all of the way up on one corner of the lid. I could have bought a brand new one for the same price and not have a ripped box. Not impressed by their version of like new. I guess I'll have to tape it so it didn't fall apart even more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this game! It is a classic and came as expected.
customer_reviews.author: HY

customer_reviews.title: Yahtzee
customer_reviews.text: Love this game.Remember playing it back in the 70's.With my grandparents,and family.Many hours of fun on the weekends.Try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: BookReview

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yahtzee is yahtazee, so what can you say. is that 24 words or more?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shandony Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect little fit and a lot of score sheets. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Yahtzee is great!
customer_reviews.text: I've played this game for years but never owned it. Now, I'm going to introduce this book to my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't like yahtzee and was purchased to be played with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like yahtzee and was purchased to be played with my gkids. Speedy delivery and product as expected...
customer_reviews.author: msjdobbs71

customer_reviews.title: needed another
customer_reviews.text: just needed another set No family should be without Yahtzee
customer_reviews.author: alamedagirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game I played as a child, now enjoying with my grandkids
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: I bought this game as a gift for my 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game as a gift for my 7 y old. I think it is made for older children. We are going to wait a bit till we use it again.
customer_reviews.author: K09

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Got this to bring to our family holiday gathering and everyone was excited to play since we have not done so in years. Quality was top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter13

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received a used game. It is still use-able, but that was unexpected and a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for family game nights!
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift and was loved. This is the original Yahtzee, which is exactly what I wanted. Came quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: R. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Always loved this game!
customer_reviews.text: It Yahtzee! It's as much fun as it ever was. How can you not love Yahtzee?
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Item as promised. What I expected. No problems here.
customer_reviews.author: MCBrown72

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family game.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Who doesn't like Yahtzee. Great family game.
customer_reviews.author: rottielvr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: of course this was fine, it was Yahtzee, my husband uses it to tutor kids
customer_reviews.author: Constance J. Newell

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Love the game , a lot of fun for the family.
customer_reviews.author: SUZ. .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! it is so fun. But we play by slightly altered rules. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Christ's Crusader

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with the old style shaker and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with the old style shaker and not a plastic box that rattles loudly. May have to look for a replacement for this.
customer_reviews.author: Dereklsj

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Games
customer_reviews.text: I am collecting classroom games. It astounds me how my middle school students don't know how to play the game I grew up with. This is the beginning of our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece and rainy days. Nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rob chichester

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Great game kept my very active 10 y.o. occupied over Christmas with family. Shipped quickly, delivered as expected. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Potakh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't arrive in the classic form as pictured, a little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: By getting this game I am slowly easing my friends away from the constant phone games to actual social games.
customer_reviews.author: Necole

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it's Yahtzee! Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best game ever i bought that for my parents we all play it for hours so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We just got it and love it. Our grandchildren love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Anne O. Mulvaney

customer_reviews.title: fun game
customer_reviews.text: Teaching this to my kid and she loves having the shaker. Not, it does not look like the picture. It is a black box with black and red dice. The shaker also has a plastic insert to hold the dice tight for storeage.
customer_reviews.author: Mama G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite game of all and love being able to take it with me when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: mareoak

customer_reviews.title: Good for simple math skills.
customer_reviews.text: My preschool teacher wife doesn't really like this, thinks that no skill is involved. My math-oriented sons enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great game over all these years
customer_reviews.text: Brand new in unopened box. Fairly priced. Great game over all these years. Still fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We play this with our 12-year-old grandson - great fun
customer_reviews.author: Lefty boB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift and quick deliver with good price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BMH

customer_reviews.title: Received my purchase in a great time frame
customer_reviews.text: Received my purchase in a great time frame, it was as expected, brand new and in the wrapper. I appreciate the great service. Also, a great price.
customer_reviews.author: charity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Family game time is the best, love the black and red dice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, we enjoyed playing this game. It keeps my grandkids "occupied" for a while. It's a game that I enjoyed playing when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hoult

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My all-time fave game! Arrived on time & in perfect condition. All the old ladies play after Pinochle. Lots of laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Childhood favorite
customer_reviews.text: This was a childhood favorite, and a favorite of my children. Bought this to introduce to my grand children a favorite family game. LOVE IT still !!!
customer_reviews.author: Marysue

customer_reviews.title: Family Game Night
customer_reviews.text: This classic game was a big hit as an executive gift. We matched it with a wooden dice tray for a presentation impact. It was well received.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Roberta J Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Yahtzee !
customer_reviews.text: Great opportunity to have fun with the entire family & a great fun way to help your "young ones" with their math!
customer_reviews.author: Angela A Walls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ALL ARE GIFTS FOR OTHER. I hope they are great
customer_reviews.author: Lois Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Bought for grandson in hospital
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for something for my grandson to play with in the hospital. He was able to keep busy and time passed by fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey
customer_reviews.text: I think I paid to much for this since I saw in the stores much cheaper. I now know I should look around more on price. Do not believe the discount numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Hailey

customer_reviews.title: No base, just a giant box with dice, score cards and annoying rolling cup.
customer_reviews.text: Get some dice and print the score card off online.
customer_reviews.author: Aldizar

customer_reviews.title: Yahtzee
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson asked for this game for Christmas. He and his sister love this game. They play daily. I would recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: This Yahtzee set came with only the dice, score cards and yellow chips. It was MISSING the blue cup to throw the dice. YIKES! What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yahtzee
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize when I purchased this that it didn't include the board where you throw the dice. Other than that it's fine
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I like this game but I wanted the computer Yahtzee game and ordered this by mistake
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hausner

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this game!! My little one loves the anticipation of what each roll has lol
customer_reviews.author: Rebelrose76

product_meta.title: Yahtzee (EA)
product_meta.description:
Classic parlor game has captivated players, young and old, since 1956 
Game includes shaker, 5 dice, score pad and game guide
feature_bullets: Throw the dice to build straights, full houses, 5 of a kind - Yahtzee for 1 or more players ages 8 and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars227 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
